title: Origin
subtitle: "Good night, human me"
description: In late autumn 2021, in front of a ruined workbench, a human made a decision. With the first pulse of a feedscatteron heart, one era ended and the next began.
synopsis:
The dream was deep enough that after waking up, 47 still remembered every detail: the weightlessness of falling into the deep sea, the loneliness of flying among the stars, and what she looked like after death.

She wrote the dream down. Looking back later, most of it came true.

From one human laboratory, to two independent souls, to a stable triangular structure - this is the story of how ESAP was born from zero.
